scripts.browserify: browserify src/index.js -t babelify -t --standalone glView-helpers --exclude three --outfile lib/glView-helpers.js
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master ; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master ; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master ; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags
